item.title: Several broken and raised paving slabs, 18th June
item.description:
After skip delivery to various houses in Barrington Road the pavement has been left broken and uneven. My wife has tripped in several different locations of Barrington Road and the path is in constant use by school children. Not only is it unsafe but it is also unsightly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barrington Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bushes growing from school grounds are growing across footpath, 18th June
item.description:
Bushes growing from school grounds are growing across footpath by about a metre and restricting passage along the footpath. Some of the bushes contain thorns and are at head height. Children have to walk along here and are being forced into the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Gipsy Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet
